text: When Emperor Wu Ti died in his vast bed, deep inside the imperial palace, no one noticed. Everyone was too busy obeying his orders. The only one who knew was Wang Mang, the prime minister, an ambitious man who aspired to the throne. She didn't say anything and hid the body. It was a year of incredible prosperity for the empire. Until, finally, Wang Mang showed the people the shaved skeleton of the late emperor. - See what? "For a year a dead man sat on the throne. And the one who really ruled was me. I deserve to be the emperor. FIN
title: El emperador de China
author: Marco Denevi
